subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Scott was a three-time All-Star and hit 271 home runs, or taters, as he called them. In 1967, he helped lead the Boston Red Sox to their first pennant in 21 years.
snippet: Mr. Scott was a three-time All-Star and hit 271 home runs, or taters, as he called them. In 1967, he helped lead the Boston Red Sox to their first pennant in 21 years.
